snippet: After a third horse involved in the production of the show was injured and euthanized on Tuesday, HBO said it would suspend the filming of scenes involving horses and the American Humane Association called for an investigation.
abstract: After a third horse involved in the production of the show was injured and euthanized on Tuesday, HBO said it would suspend the filming of scenes involving horses and the American Humane Association called for an investigation.

headline.main: Questions Raised After Third Horse Dies on HBO's 'Luck'
